nodes.text: Hammertong was the codename of a magmatic crystal that was researched by Geonosian hives and outsourced to a facility on Mygeeto. Hammertong was mentioned as part of a report from Colonel Haxen Delto of Rebel Alliance Intelligence Service to General Davits Draven about the Geonosians and an Ultimate Weapon, as uncovered from second-hand sources by the Rebel Alliance years earlier, and the rising rumors about a project that the Galactic Empire may be operating.

The report would be included in The Rebel Files, and after it was rediscovered on Durkteel in 34 ABY and handed to the Resistance, Major Caluan Ematt wrote a note on the report stating that Hammertong needed to be looked at more closely, as he believed that the longer the rumors of a First Order superweapon persisted, the more he was convinced that it was factual.
